articles.description: The Apple Watch Series 10 could add revolutionary health sensors for glucose, blood pressure, and sleep apnea detection. This SEO article explores the potential benefits, limitations, and privacy impacts of continuous condition monitoring from the wrist.
articles.content: The Apple Watch has become an increasingly capable health and fitness tracker over the years. Each new model brings improvements to the heart rate monitor, activity tracking, and other biometrics. Th… [+8107 chars]
